body_html: I would be ok with printing is_leaf=False, but I think grad_fn is too much of an implementation detail. It's not documented, it's not guaranteed to remain the same, it's not even very readable unless you know how autograd works (why MulBackward0 and not MulBackwardN? how does this field work? if it's printed it should be important, right?). People should never depend on how the graph is constructed.

body: I would be ok with printing `is_leaf=False`, but I think `grad_fn` is too much of an implementation detail. It's not documented, it's not guaranteed to remain the same, it's not even very readable unless you know how autograd works (why `MulBackward0` and not `MulBackwardN`? how does this field work? if it's printed it should be important, right?). People should never depend on how the graph is constructed.
